entries.meaning: A creation, original idea, or innovation, usually used to indicate the originators
examples: The entire project was the brainchild of a small group of visionaries.

verbs.description: brainchild (third-person singular simple present brainchilds, present participle brainchilding, simple past and past participle brainchilded)

entries.meaning: (transitive, rare) To think up; to come up with.
